subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 见面时自然打招呼并开启对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, I'm Alex! You're new here, right?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，我是亚历克斯！你是新来的吧？

responses.text: Yeah, I am! I'm Jamie. Nice to meet you!
responses.text_cn: 对，我是杰米，很高兴认识你！

responses.text: Yes, I just joined the team. Nice to meet you too.
responses.text_cn: 是的，我刚加入团队，也很高兴认识你。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用缩写让语气更自然，别太正式

subScenes.name: 询问职业
subScenes.description: 礼貌询问对方工作领域

qaPairs.speakerText: So what do you do for work?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那你平时是做什么工作的？

responses.text: I'm a software engineer at a startup. You?
responses.text_cn: 我是初创公司的软件工程师，你呢？

responses.text: I work in marketing — it's pretty busy but fun!
responses.text_cn: 我在做市场营销，挺忙但很有趣！

qaPairs.usageNote: 问完记得反问，保持对话平衡

subScenes.name: 聊家乡爱好
subScenes.description: 自然过渡到家乡与兴趣话题

responses.text: I'm from Chengdu — love the food and chill vibes!
responses.text_cn: 我来自成都，超爱那里的美食和悠闲氛围！

responses.text: I grew up in Hangzhou. It's super green and peaceful.
responses.text_cn: 我在杭州长大的，特别绿意盎然，很安静。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用感叹词表达情绪，更显真诚

qaPairs.speakerText: What do you do to unwind after work?

responses.text: I hit the gym or binge-watch Netflix. You?
I play guitar — not great, but it helps me chill.
responses.text_cn: 我弹吉他，不专业，但能让我放松。
看书， mostly 惊悚小说。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘not great but...’降低压力，更真实

subScenes.name: 寻找共同点
subScenes.description: 基于信息发现共同兴趣

qaPairs.speakerText: Wait, you're from Chengdu? I went there last year — best hot pot ever!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 等等，你是成都的？我去年去过，那里的火锅绝了！

responses.text: No way! I miss it so much. Let's swap recommendations!
responses.text_cn: 真的吗？我超想吃！咱们交换下店家吧！

responses.text: Seriously? I've been wanting to try that place you mentioned!
responses.text_cn: 真的？我正想找你说的那家店呢！

subScenes.name: 礼貌告别
subScenes.description: 自然结束对话并留出后续联系空间

qaPairs.speakerText: I should grab another drink — but it was really nice chatting with you!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我去拿杯饮料，不过和你聊天真开心！

responses.text: Same here! Let's grab coffee next week?
Totally! Enjoy your drink — catch you later!
You too! Have a good one.
